title: After two failed attempts, Canada bans conversion therapy
content:
1. After two failed attempts, Canada bans conversion therapy  NPR
  2. Canada bans conversion therapy, a practice Trudeau calls 'despicable and degrading'  CNN
  3. Canada bans conversion therapy, telling LGBTQ residents 'we'll always stand up for you'  USA TODAY
  4. Canada bans 'conversion therapy,' threatens therapists with prison  Fox News
  5. Canada bans conversion therapy  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 2度の失敗を経て、カナダは転換療法を禁止する
经过两次失败的尝试，加拿大禁止转换疗法
經過兩次失敗的嘗試，加拿大禁止轉換療法
